items.title: Portfolio
items.desc: My personal portfolio site, designed in Figma and built with React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS. It showcases a modern, scalable frontend infrastructure featuring React Query, multi-language support, dark/light mode, and Cypress tests.

items.title: Technological Pizza Website
items.desc: A multi-page food ordering platform built with React. It simulates a complete e-commerce flow, allowing users to select items from a menu, fill out a dynamic form (including validation), and view their order summary.
